issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Fix reoptimization for semijoin reduction cases

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
reported by [~t3rmin4t0r]

In case dynamic partition pruning; the operator statistics became partial; to only reflect the actually scanned partitions; but they are being used as an information about the "full" table...which leads to the exchange of the 2 tables being joined...which is really unfortunate...
fields.summary: Fix reoptimization in case of DPP and Semijoin optimization

comments.body:
+1 
We need similar fix for semijoin reduction as well.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12930156 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

so far signatures was added during stats annotation; and by doing it there - it also "silently" also handled the case of multiple tablescans about the same thing...
Although this should be changed later; but right now I've moved the link to a walker (as I've done it for semijoin - because for that I saw no other way) - so from now on this patch will incorporate HIVE-20087 as well..
